room_title: Escape room "Brandon's Totally Tubular Bedroom" by Escape Room Adventures in Fort Myers
review: Went to this room last year and it was absolutely amaze balls I went with some of my friends for my birthday and it was the best time I had had in a while

room_title: Escape room "Brandon's Totally Tubular Bedroom" by Escape Room Adventures in Fort Myers
review: So much fun! We did Brandon's bedroom and it was great! Highly recommend this to any and everyone!

room_title: Escape room "Brandon's Totally Tubular Bedroom" by Escape Room Adventures in Fort Myers
review: It was our first time ever doing an escape room so we weren't sure what to expect. We did Brandon's room. Loved the throw backs from the 80s. Felt it could have used more decor, but we werent really sure where to look or get started for that matter so I guess it all worked out. We didnt get out in time due to some math issues of our own, but we had a lot of fun and want to go back and try the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Brandon's Totally Tubular Bedroom" by Escape Room Adventures in Fort Myers
review: It was an amazing experience! Kiera was such a great host, and was there at every turn if we needed a clue to get us moving! Brandon's room was laid out well and definitely gets you thinking. It will keep you on your toes. Make sure to look at everything in the room, everything plays a part in helping you solve it! Great way to spend time with friends, and spend the night out!

room_title: Escape room "Brandon's Totally Tubular Bedroom" by Escape Room Adventures in Fort Myers
review: Absolutely fun! Can't wait to do this again sometime!

room_title: Escape room "Brandon's Totally Tubular Bedroom" by Escape Room Adventures in Fort Myers
review: Had a great time!! Can't wait to go back again and try a new room!
